title: SIC! SIC! SIC!
html:
SIC! SIC! SIC!

“No Hop Pickers, Travellers or People With Adverse Hairstyles.” [Sign on the door of an inn in Alton, Hampshire. Submitted by Thomas L. Bernard, Springfield, Massachusetts.]
